club.title: THE CLUB
club.column1:
Algaida Volei Club is much more than a sports club: it is a school of values, a committed community, and a place to grow as individuals through sport.

We are part of Alg√†lia Esports Club, an organisation rooted in the municipality of Algaida that promotes sport from a formative, inclusive and non-profit perspective.

We are dedicated to promoting and developing volleyball among children and young people, combining passion for the game with respect, effort and teamwork.

Our teams compete in various school and federation categories, always supported by a close-knit and committed coaching staff aligned with the club‚Äôs values.

Whether you are new to the sport or already have experience, here you will find a space to learn, excel and enjoy yourself with your team-mates.
club.column2:
At Algaida Volei Club we place great importance on:

‚Ä¢ Education in values such as respect, responsibility and commitment.

‚Ä¢ Positive coexistence, with clear behaviour guidelines and smooth communication between the club, families and athletes.

‚Ä¢ Support for families, who are a key part of our sports project.

‚Ä¢ Respect for facilities and equipment, understanding that the club belongs to everyone.

Each season we launch a structured and accessible registration process that includes all the necessary information on documents, fees and conditions. It can be completed easily through an online form.

Our goal is not only to train volleyball players but also to help form good people‚Äîresponsible, supportive and keen to improve every day.

Thank you for being part of our community. Together, we will keep volleyball growing in Algaida!

sections.heading: 1. Data controller
sections.content: The data controller for the information collected in this form is Algaida Volei Club, located at Calle X, City, Country.

sections.heading: 2. Purpose of processing
sections.content: Data are used to manage registrations, issue receipts and send communications related to club activities.

sections.heading: 3. Data-subject rights
sections.content: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, restriction and portability by contacting contacto@algaidavolei.es.

sections.heading: 4. Data retention
sections.content: Data will be kept for the current sports season and until their erasure is requested.

sections.heading: 1. Website identification
sections.content: This website, www.algaidavolei.es, is operated by Algaida Volei Club (Tax ID: XXXX), with its registered office at Calle X, City.

sections.heading: 2. Terms of use
sections.content: Access to and use of this website confer the status of User and imply acceptance of the terms set out in this Legal Notice.

sections.heading: 3. Intellectual property
sections.content: The contents, design and code of this site are protected by current intellectual-property regulations.

sections.heading: 1. What are cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small files that websites send to the User‚Äôs browser to store certain information.

sections.heading: 2. Types of cookies we use
sections.content: We use technical cookies for operation, analytics cookies for statistics, and third-party cookies (Google Analytics).

sections.heading: 3. Disabling and deleting cookies
sections.content: You can configure your browser to reject or delete all cookies. See your browser‚Äôs help section for details.

sections.heading: 1. Data controller
sections.content: ALGAIDA VOLEI CLUB ‚Äì Tax ID: G16614737. Address: CASAL PERE CAPELL√Ä, C/ DELS CAVALLER N¬∫ 22, 07210, ALGAIDA, BALEARIC ISLANDS. Phone: 651 873 851. Email: algaidavoleiclub@gmail.com. No Data Protection Officer is required under Article 37 of Regulation (EU) 2016/679.

sections.heading: 2. Purpose of processing
sections.content: We process the information provided to deliver contracted sports and training services, for administrative, accounting and tax purposes, to offer sports services according to your interests and to issue invoices. A commercial profile will be created, without automated decisions. Data will be stored while the commercial relationship exists and for up to five years after the last contract, unless erasure is requested.

sections.heading: 3. Legal basis
sections.content: The legal basis is performance of the contract under the Commercial Code and Civil Code. For commercial communications, Articles 20 and 21 of Law 34/2002 apply. Consent is requested for commercial offers, and its withdrawal will not affect the service. Providing data is mandatory to deliver the service. Consent is mandatory to receive commercial communications.

sections.heading: 4. Recipients
sections.content: Data will not be transferred to third parties unless legally required. No international transfers or automated decisions are expected.

sections.heading: 5. Data-subject rights
sections.content: Anyone has the right to confirm whether we process their data. You may access, rectify, delete, restrict processing, object and request portability. You may also lodge a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.agpd.es).

sections.heading: 1. Consent for minors or adults
sections.content: The father, mother or legal guardian (if the player is a minor), or the player themself (if of legal age), authorises the use of the player‚Äôs image and/or photographs in sports and communication activities of Algaida Volei Club. This authorisation includes publication of such images on the club‚Äôs official website and social networks, including Facebook and Instagram.

sections.heading: 2. Information on data processing
sections.content: In accordance with Article 28 of the GDPR, Facebook Inc. and Instagram LLC will act as processors of the personal data (images). The data may be stored on their servers in the United States. This authorisation excludes uses that infringe the right to honour, personal privacy or self-image in accordance with Organic Law 1/1985. The authorisation is free and does not give rise to economic rights for the use of the image.

sections.heading: 3. Explicit consent
sections.content:
Please indicate your decision for each of the following items:
1. Do you authorise publication of images on the club‚Äôs website?
2. Do you authorise publication of images on Facebook and Instagram?
3. Do you authorise use of images on other official club social networks?

ethicCode.title: Ethical code and rules of conduct

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This ethical code sets out the guidelines and rules that define the behaviour, attitudes and values expected of everyone involved with Algaida Volei Club. Our aim is to foster a healthy, respectful environment committed to sporting and personal development.

sections.heading: 2. Rules of conduct and behaviour
sections.content: Respect the coach and team-mates; ask the coach questions, learn actively, help others, avoid negative criticism and take responsibility for your own sports equipment.

sections.heading: 3. Training guidelines
sections.content: Punctuality and mandatory attendance; respect for equipment and facilities; appropriate clothing; avoid objects that may cause injury; take care of your health; avoid mobile-phone use during sessions.

sections.heading: 4. Behaviour in competition
sections.content: Correct uniform, sporting attitude, respect for referee, opponents and spectators. Give advance notice if you cannot attend. Participation depends on attitude and attendance as decided by the coach.

sections.heading: 5. Ten rules of good practice
sections.content: 1. Respect municipal facilities. 2. Punctuality and mandatory attendance. 3. Take care of club equipment. 4. Play in other categories if required. 5. Respect coaches. 6. Disciplinary criteria consistent with club values. 7. Communicate through the team liaison. 8. Family involvement. 9. Respect during training and matches. 10. Complaints must be addressed to the team liaison.

sections.heading: 6. Families and communication
sections.content: Families are a fundamental pillar. They must respect coaches‚Äô decisions and channel queries through the team liaison. Avoid technical interference during training and matches.
